name: Auction
about: Make your bid, Shape your squad
rules: The captain will be awarded a distribution of 20,000 points.
You need to assemble a team with a minimum of 27 members.
Each bid commences with a base point of 100.
Make sure there are atleast 7 female members in your team.
The team must have one member from the leadership.

name: Tera naam
about: Craft a team name, logo, and tagline that exudes nostalgic charm while remaining refreshingly uniquie.
rules: You have to be within certain limits while playing the game
The constraints are applied without any bias
You can either choose rule 1 or rule 2
